News.headline: The Emirates FA Cup – First Round
News.page_title: The Emirates FA Cup – First Round
News.URL_keywords: The Emirates FA Cup – First Round
News.short_description: Dagenham & Redbridge have been drawn to play FC Halifax Town in the first round of the Emirates FA Cup.
News.description:
After the Daggers' 3-1 win over Wealdstone FC on Saturday, the Daggers next game in the Emirates FA Cup game is due to be played on the weekend commencing Friday 4th November against FC Halifax Town.

Details for the game will be announced in due course.
